tool_description: Searches supplier databases using product/service keywords, industry codes, and basic criteria to identify potential suppliers.

product_keywords.description: Keywords describing the product or service needed

industry_codes.description: NAICS or SIC industry classification codes

company_size.description: Preferred supplier size: small, medium, large, enterprise

max_results.description: Maximum number of suppliers to return (1-1000)

error_messages: Invalid product keywords: At least one keyword is required and each must be 2-50 characters.
Invalid industry codes: Industry codes must follow NAICS (6-digit) or SIC (4-digit) format.
Invalid company size: Must be one of [small, medium, large, enterprise].
Invalid max_results: Must be an integer between 1 and 1000.
Database connection failed: Unable to connect to supplier database, try again later.
usage: Provide product_keywords as an array of descriptive terms. Optionally filter by industry_codes, company_size, and set max_results limit. Returns a list of matching suppliers with basic information.

supplier_ids.description: Array of unique supplier identification numbers

match_scores.description: Array of relevance scores (0-100) for each supplier
